main event: An unidentified flying object was reported at an altitude of 23,000 ft with a speed of about 500 knots based on ground radar observation.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 2 minutes., The object exhibited erratic changes in position., Initial evaluation suggested it could be a balloon or possibly an aircraft., An additional sighting was reported by Braniff 42 on August 30, 1957., The UFO was lost from sight when it went behind a cloud.
